active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a world of rising phishing attacks, should organizations enforce passwordless authentication using biometrics and passkeys as per NIST SP 800-53 IA-2 and SP 800-63 guidelines? Argue for or against, citing specific IA-2 controls (e.g., multi-factor requirements), assurance levels (IAL/AAL/FAL), and real-world examples like the 2023 MOVEit breach. Consider trade-offs in usability, security, and compliance.
